programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant Park was founded in 1931 and is 1,640km2. It hosts more than 450 elephants and other mammals and was created in response to the elephant population falling as low as eleven.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: In the centre of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now it is a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: Tigerfish: Africa's Piranha
programme.desc: Tigerfish are terrifying freshwater predators. Extreme angler Andy Coetzee undertakes a hazardous journey to study the giant-sized species in their habitat in the Congo.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: There are many fine examples of evolutionary history in the natural world. Animals adapt through a series of small, random mutations and usually do so in order to compete more effectively for food, water and space. Crocodiles are certainly of an ancient lineage, they are believed to be 200 million years old. Sharks have gone through the process of adaptation and evolutionary experimentation as well.

programme.title: Sons of Enkai
programme.desc: An intimate look at the relationship between man and nature in one of the most iconic wild places on Earth: the Masai Mara, Kenya. A Maasai warrior guides viewers through natural epic events and spectacular wildlife.

programme.title: Big Cat Tales
programme.desc: Chongo is unwilling to share buffalo with the rest of the pride and Fig continues to give vital lessons to the young cub and a cheetah and hyena battle.

programme.title: Animal Armory
programme.desc: Cuttlefish and squid eject a black fluid to help them hide from predators, while skunks aren't the only animals to use scent glands for defence.

programme.title: The new animal kingdom Japan
programme.desc: Winter has gripped the north of Honshu and Hokkaido. The fox and its partner are expecting a litter of cubs, but it is difficult to find food. They each go their own way in search of food.

programme.title: Epic Animal Encounters
programme.desc: A showcase of some of wildlife's most remarkable moments, caught on film by amateurs and professionals. We reveal the full spectrum of animal behaviour: the brutal, the beautiful and the bizarre. Each moment is explained by experts in the field.

programme.title: Jungle Planet
programme.desc: African rainforests, which are among the oldest in the world and are inhabited by some of the most legendary animals including gorillas, chimpanzees and okapi.

programme.title: Okavango: River of Dreams
programme.desc: Follows the life of lioness Fekeetsa as she travels around her territory in the Upper Okavango river.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Kamuti is a wise old leopard who has reigned over two square miles of prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for ten years, but now she is in trouble. At 13-years-old, Kamuti is one of the oldest leopards in the African bush, and she is not as effective a hunter as she used to be. Kamuti's problems are compounded by her neighbours, the Nsefu pride of lions, who steal her kills and attack her on sight.

programme.title: Hot Life Africa
programme.desc: Lion prey tends to feed when hunters are resting, which means when the sun is at its highest. A rise in temperature affects the behaviour of the animals living in these hot areas.

programme.title: Tigerfish: Africa's Piranha
programme.desc: Tigerfish are terrifying freshwater predators. Extreme angler Andy Coetzee undertakes a hazardous journey to study the giant-sized species in their habitat in the Congo.

programme.title: Sons of Enkai
programme.desc: An intimate look at the relationship between man and nature in one of the most iconic wild places on Earth: the Masai Mara, Kenya. A Maasai warrior guides viewers through natural epic events and spectacular wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: For many animals, being able to transfer their genes is the most important reason for life.

programme.title: The Queen In The North
programme.desc: The filmmaker sheds light on a feline predator and her dramatic struggle for survival as she catches prey and feeds her young in the cold and unforgiving conditions.

programme.title: Viper Queens
programme.desc: Velvet the Gaboon viper and Therma the rattlesnake are two mothers facing different challenges in extreme, contrasting landscapes.

programme.title: Search for the King Cobra
programme.desc: India's highly venomous snakes are over four metres long and widely feared, but little is known about them.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade travels the United States in search of river monsters living in the nation's waterways. He goes from the Indian River Lagoon in Florida to the Lake of the Ozarks in Missouri.

programme.title: Hot Life Africa
programme.desc: Lion prey tends to feed when hunters are resting, which means when the sun is at its highest. A rise in temperature affects the behaviour of the animals living in these hot areas.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: There are many fine examples of evolutionary history in the natural world. Animals adapt through a series of small, random mutations and usually do so in order to compete more effectively for food, water and space. Crocodiles are certainly of an ancient lineage, they are believed to be 200 million years old. Sharks have gone through the process of adaptation and evolutionary experimentation as well.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Beautiful but deadly, these cats rule the animal kingdom. Follow the plight of four species as they struggle to survive in four very different landscapes.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Looking at how some of nature's deadliest predators use an array of hunting methods, from their teeth and claws to incredible stealth and cunning.

programme.title: Wild Dynasties
programme.desc: Growing up in the wild is no easy feat. It takes fiercely protective parents and sometimes an entire squadron, along with a pinch of luck, to ensure these wild babies reach their full potential.

programme.title: Charms Bond
programme.desc: Hilarity ensues when a young man, his cousin and a friend hatch a plan to steal money from his miserly step-mother. 'Charms Bond' stars Priya Anand, Yogi Babu and Mirchi Shiva.

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: After the death of the ruling party's supreme leader in God's own country, a power vaccuum gives rise to unprecedent forces in the chaos for succession, impacting both the party and state. The 2019 Malayalam blockbuster Lucifer stars Mohanlal, Vivek Oberois and Manju Warrier.

programme.title: Baadshah Pehlwaan
programme.desc: Krishna is an orphan who is being brought up by a gym owner whose name is Sarkar. Krishna beats the odds to become a Baadshah Pehlwaan, but when he falls in love, he gets into a dispute with himself.

programme.title: Policewala
programme.desc: A young musician with a psychological disorder is convinced that three men murdered his parents. However, he is unable to identify any of them. Will he be able to get to the bottom of the mystery? '1: Ek Ka Dum' stars Mahesh Babu, Kriti Sanon, Nassar, Pradeep Rawat and Kelly Dorji.

programme.title: Soorma
programme.desc: Based on the life of hockey legend Sandeep Singh, 'Soorma' is a story of determination, hard work and love for the sport. When the upcoming hockey player is accidentally shot and left paralysed, he decides to do whatever it takes to overcome his disability so he can lead the Indian team to victory. The movie stars Diljit Dosanjh, Taapsee Pannu, Angad Bedi and Vijay Raaz.

programme.title: TE3N
programme.desc: A beautiful woman and an auto driver fake a romantic relationship to deter suitors, but their plan backfires as they unexpectedly develop real feelings for each other. The romantic-drama movie stars Nagarjuna, Deepti Bhatnagar, Simran and Dara Singh.

programme.title: Firangi
programme.desc: Set in the 1920s, the undisputed King of Comedy Kapil Sharma plays a young man with the unique ability to cure backaches with a kick. However, the family of the girl he wants to marry rejects his proposal as he serves the very people against whom they have been fighting for independence. 'Firangi' also stars Ishita Dutta and Monica Gill.

programme.title: Pyaar Kiya Nahin Jata
programme.desc: After her father's death, a young woman escapes marriage pressure in Kerala to work as an accountant in Kent. Fate takes a dark twist when she becomes a nanny to the children of a domineering man who desires her at any cost. 'Pyaar Kiya Nahin Jata' stars Diwakar Pundir, Sonali Bendre and Nikhil Chinapa.

programme.title: TE3N
programme.desc: Based on the 2013 South Korean film 'Montage', the mystery-thriller follows a 70-year-old man on a quest to unravel the truth of what happened to his granddaughter. He enlists the help of a priest and a police officer to find the people who kidnapped and killed her. 'Te3n' stars Amitabh Bachchan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Sabyasachi Chakraborty, Padmavati Rao and Vidya Balan.

programme.title: Badava Rascal
